DOC.brief_summary: Background Several study show effect osteopathic manipulative treatment neonatal care reduce length stay , gastrointestinal problem , clubfoot complication improve cranial asymmetry infant affect plagiocephaly . Despite several result obtain , still lack standardized osteopathic evaluation treatment procedure newborn recover neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) . The aim research provide guideline osteopathic approach treat hospitalize newborn . Specific evaluation test treatment develop tailor osteopathic method accord preterm term infant ' need , NICU environment , medical paramedical assistance .
DOC.brief_title: Osteopathic Approach Into Neonatology Ward : NE-O Model
DOC.criteria: newborn admit neonatal intensive care unit informed consent sign parent legal guardian post surgery patient
